Amber Valley Entertainments Contest 0 Set Test and Entertainments Contest
amber-valley-entertainments-contest

An Epic Symphony
Leisure Centre, Alfreton, Derbyshire, England, UK Bands played an entertainments programme that included the Heroic March from An Epic Symphony.
Best performance of the test piece: Rhodian Brass Best performance by a soloist: Foss Dyke Best deportment: Kibworth
